de.weltraumschaf.ebnf.ast
Interface Composite

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractComposite, Choice, Loop, Option, Rule, Sequence, Syntax
public interface Composite

Represents an object in the AST model which can have some child nodes.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

Method Summary
 void addChild(Node child)
          Append a child Node to the list of children.
 int countChildren()
          Count of direct children nodes.
 List<Node> getChildren()
          Returns an iterator for the child nodes.
 boolean hasChildren()
          Whether the node has direct child nodes or not.
